about_the_game:
Embark on a spine-chilling odyssey with "No Ticket Back," a fusion of
horror, roguelike, strategy simulation, zombie survival, tower
defense, RPG, crafting and building, and colony builder genres. The SS
McCalister's Hope, once a beacon of hope bound for Mars, now drifts as
a haunted vessel, plagued by the looming threat of a zombie
apocalypse. Can the crew endure the nightmarish onslaught and escape
the clutches of their ghostly ship?


Buckle up for an immersive journey into darkness, where every decision
could mean the difference between life and death. Delve into the rich
narrative of the last hope for humanity, as survivors of a ravaged
Earth seek redemption amidst the stars.




"No Ticket Back: Craft, Survive & Escape" is not for the
faint-hearted. Navigate treacherous corridors, fend off relentless
enemies, and rebuild the colony from the brink of destruction. Can you
stem the tide of the deadly GOO before it consumes everything in its
path?



Prepare to confront your deepest fears in a harrowing struggle
for survival, where the line between friend and foe blurs amidst the
shadows of the ghost ship. Will you emerge victorious and lead your
crew to safety, or will you succumb to the horrors that lurk within?
The choice is yours.

Embark on the Abyss: Explore the Depths of 'No Ticket Back

Craft & Build

Uncover the secrets of deadly traps, walls, and towers
as you confront the encroaching darkness, fortifying your defenses to
withstand the horrors that prowl the night. Embark on a Story-Rich
Journey to the Interstellar Promised Land amidst the haunting
mysteries of space.

Colony Simulator:

Rebuild your shattered colony amidst the shadows of
the ghost ship, where every decision shapes the fate of your fellow
survivors.

Resource Management:

Scavenge for gold, construct vital habitats and
greenhouses, and maintain a delicate balance of food, power, and
wealth to sustain the dwindling hopes of your crew. But beware: in the
depths of space, danger lurks in every shadow.

Zombie Survival:

Brace yourself for the relentless onslaught of the
undead, as the ghost ship awakens with a hunger for flesh and blood.
Only by fortifying your defenses during the fleeting daylight hours
can you hope to survive the horrors that lurk in the night.

Exploration

Dare to venture into the forsaken depths of the derelict
spacecraft, where untold mysteries lie waiting to be uncovered.
Explore the remains of the abandoned parts of the spacecraft in a
third-person roguelite style, armed with powerful weapons and power
jump tricks. But be warned: in the darkness, whispers echo, and
nightmares come to life.

Upgrade System

Unlock the secrets of future technologies, enhancing
your weapons, armor, and soldiers with newfound power. But with each
step towards victory comes the risk of awakening forces beyond your
control.

Colony Management

Navigate the treacherous waters of colony survival,
as you struggle to maintain order amidst the chaos. Will you lead with
a firm hand, or will your grip falter in the face of insurmountable
odds?

Horror

Immerse yourself in a world of chilling terror, where every
creak of the ship and every flicker of light heralds the approach of
unspeakable horrors. Can you withstand the darkness, or will you
become lost in its embrace?

Will you brave the journey of the one-way ticket trip? The call has
been made—will you answer it?

name: No Ticket Back: Craft, Survive & Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10 or WIN11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10 or WIN11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 processor or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: As the brave crew sets course for the Red Planet, their mission takes a terrifying turn. In the vast emptiness of space, their once-proud vessel becomes a haunted nightmare. Can they survive the horrors that await them in the darkness and escape or will they succumb before completing their mission?
